author: Staff Reporter
text:
An Indian Gaur attacked a farmer near his farm at Petharaikadu village off Pandrimalai hill near here on Thursday. R. Sivakumar (33) was working in his farm when the wild animal attacked him. With serious injuries on his stomach, he was rushed to Dindigul Government Hospital where he was referred to Government Rajaji Hospital in Madurai.

A herd of Indian Gaurs entered the campus of Government Hospital in Kodaikanal in the evening much to the shock of inmates and the staff. Fire and Rescue Services personnel burst crackers to drive them back into the reserve forests.
title: Indian Gaur attacks farmer
